divs: sighting detailsat 9:59pm i saw the same star\round shape go through ursa major (big dipper) make the same pattern which is the curve of space rather than a straight shot like a plane or if it were in the earth's atmosphere. then later it returned going the other direction but this time it seemed to track behind (above)an airplane (jet) just staying right behind it. later it came back in the other direction. i also saw the flashes of light that look like the same symbols i had seen the other night. i guess what i am reporting is i'm seeing the same pattern every night. i am reporting this on july 8th, 2011 and i have seen this pattern repeated almost every night. something is truly happening and it is escalating. i just know . . .
trends: There have been 39 other sightings in Redding
There were no other sightings in Redding on or around July 7th 2011
Summary: The same pattern of star(s) vehicle movements just as the other night
